text: Makhoina Aphaba Pao adugi achumba adugi matung-inna chumna chattre haiba urabada, makhoi pumnamakki mamangda eina Peter-da haikhi, “Nahak Jihudi amani, adumakpu nahakna Jihudi amagumna nattaduna atoppa phurupki mi amagi matougum hingli. Adu oiragadi kamdouna nahakna atoppa phurupki misingda Jihudigi chatnabising adu illu haina namlibano?”
